Personal info

Gerrit Lindeque

Which City? Kusnacht is the answer...

Kusnacht in Switzerland, it was where the psychologist Carl Jung lived and practised and the scenery is very impressive in that part of the world! Close to Lake Zurich and Switzerland abounds with scenic mountains!

Foreign Language: Japanese is very useful to know if you're into untranslated games...

English Japanese
Where is the (respected) bathroom? O-tearai wa doko desu ka?
Is everything okay? Daijoubou desu ka?
I don't know Wakaranai/Wakarimasen
